body: Open ladybug_ladybug component and change [this line](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/src/ladybug_ladybug.py#L992). Then press F5 and close ladybug_ladybug. Until the next time that you drop the original ladybug_ladybug to the canvas, the component will generate the sky  with +s2.
